verses.text: Ix lolonnhej vinhaj Job:
Svak' in ti' t'a yichanh Dios Syal Yuj Smasanil, aton jun max yal sk'ol sb'oan yaj tas vaji, aton tz'ak'an ixtaxel in pensar yuj in yaelal,
yacb'an pitzan into, yacb'an tzato yal vik'an vik' yuj, anhej tas yel ol vala', manh ol val tas manh yeloc.
Toxon malaj b'ak'uinh ol vala' to yel tas tzeyal t'ayin. Manh ol in chaoch t'a vib'anh to ay in mul.
Ol valnhej to wach' in pensar, manh ol in q'uex tas svala'. Tzin b'eyk'olej val in b'a to malaj in mul svab'i.
Masanil eb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin, jaocab' yaelal t'a yib'anh eb', icha yaelal sjavi t'a yib'anh eb' chuc.
多Tasto val ayoch yipoc sk'ol eb' chuc, ayic tz'ik'jiel sq'uinal eb' yuj Dios?
Ayic ayoch eb' t'a syaelal, 多tom ol scha yab' Dios ayic ol tevoc eb' t'ay?
多Tocval tz'ilchaj stzalajk'olal eb' d'ha Dios Syal Yuj Smasanil tato malaj b'aj syal sb'a eb' t'ay?
Ha ticnaic ol in ch'ox val snivan poder Dios Syal Yuj Smasanil t'ayex yet' tas nab'il yuj.
Ha ex tik eyilnacxo juntzanh chi', haxo ticnaic jun, 多tas yuj tzex lolon t'a manh pensaril?
Ha jun yaelal tik syak' Dios Syal Yuj Smasanil spacoc t'a eb' ixtum anima.
Wach'chom tzijtum yuninal eb', palta ol cham eb' t'a oval, ma yuj vejel.
Axo eb' olto kan t'a skal eb', a ilya ol ik'an scham eb'. Axo eb' ix yetb'eyum eb' scani, manh ol ok'laj eb' ix yuj eb'.
Wach'chom a eb' chuc chi' ste molb'ej q'uen plata eb' icha lum pococ, wach'chom manh jantacoc spichul eb' ayeq'ui,
axom junok vinh vinac te wach' spensar ol ak'anoch juntzanh pichul chi', ol yak'an sgana vinh yet' q'uen plata chi'.
Ha spat eb' chuc chi', k'uun, lajan icha juntzanh yet'tal nok' tzocoy, ma icha junok lechpat t'a cal munlajel.
Ha eb' chuc chi' svaycanem eb' yet' sb'eyumal, haxo tz'el svayanh eb' manhxalaj tas t'a eb', meb'haxo eb'.
Ha xivelal ol javoc t'a eb' icha ha' eluma', ma icha tz'aj yik'jib'at junok tas yuj ik'nhab' t'ak'walil.
Ha chacxuxum ik' scot t'a stojolal b'aj sjavi k'u, a ol ek' leman spat eb',
ol och xuman t'a eb', ol lajvoquel eb' yuj. Wach'chom olto snib'ej el lemnaj sb'a eb', palta manhxalaj nivank'olal t'a eb'.
Ha jun oval ik' chi' ol k'anh val, ol xururoc yoch t'a spatic eb'.
